results.name: Number of even divisors d of 2n such that d-1 is prime.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..15120
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..100000
mathematica: Array[DivisorSum[2 #, 1 &, And[EvenQ@ #, PrimeQ[# - 1]] &] &, 105] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jan 04 2019 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 04 2019
